channel.title: Events on Penn CS Theory Group
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Penn CS Theory Group

item.title: Theory Seminar Spring 2025: 1/17 through 5/02
item.description: The theory seminar is back for Spring 2025! Talks will take place Fridays, 12-1pm in Amy Guttman Hall 414. The first schdueled talk is on January 17th, and the seminar is currently schdueled to run through May 2nd. Hope to see you there!
